name.baseName: a local branded pure milk productions ; Dairy processing
本地品牌纯牛奶生产 ; 乳业加工

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Specifically, a large amount of water is needed during the cooling and pre-heating of raw milk, as well as the pre-heating and sterilization of the liquid milk.
具体来说，原料奶的冷却和预热以及液态奶的预热和灭菌都需要大量的水。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The Tetra Pak 1litre pure liquid milk is selected to assess its lifecycle based carbon footprint.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The milk source base is located at Hongya Country, Southwestern Sichuan Province, China, about 147 kilometres far from Chengdu City, the provincial capital. The diary processing plant is located at Pixian, suburb of Chengdu City, which is about 175 kilometres far from the milk source base. The branded milk is mainly distributed to the central Chengdu City, about 40 kilometres distances from the diary processing plant. The milk packaging waste is transported to the municipal landfill for final disposal, about 30 kilometres away from the central city.
奶源基地位于中国四川省西南部洪崖县，距离省会成都市约147公里。乳品加工厂位于成都郊区郫县，距离奶源基地约175公里。品牌牛奶主要分布在距离乳制品加工厂约40公里的成都市中心。牛奶包装废弃物被运送到距离市中心约30公里的市政垃圾填埋场进行最终处理。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: This study only focused on processes that directly contributed to pure milk production, that is, only the effects of energy and material input and carbon emissions, as shown in Figure 1. The system boundary of milk life cycle is thus simplified and divided into four stages, namely, raw milk production, dairy product processing, product transportation and packaging waste disposal.
本研究仅关注对纯牛奶生产有直接贡献的过程，即仅关注能源和材料投入以及碳排放的影响，如图1所示。从而简化了牛奶生命周期的系统边界，将其划分为原料奶生产、乳制品加工、产品运输和包装废弃物处理四个阶段。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set describes the production process of local branded pure milk, a dairy product processed in Sichuan Province, China. It is used in the food industry, specifically in the dairy sector, to provide consumers with pasteurized and packaged milk. The technical quality of the milk is suitable for direct consumption and potentially for use in creating other dairy products such as cheese, yogurt, and cream. The stages considered in the dataset include raw milk production, dairy product processing, product transportation, and packaging waste disposal.
该数据集描述了中国四川省生产的本地品牌纯牛奶的生产过程。它在食品行业中使用，特别是在乳制品部门，为消费者提供巴氏杀菌和包装的牛奶。牛奶的技术质量适合直接消费，并可能用于制作其他乳制品，如奶酪、酸奶和奶油。数据集包括的阶段包括原奶生产、乳品加工、产品运输和包装废弃物处理。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Compared with the conventional LCA, the process of life cycle impact assessment is simplified in this study, as it mainly uses different categories of indicators to elaborate results of life cycle inventory (Nigri et al., 2014).
与传统的LCA相比，本研究简化了生命周期影响评估的过程，主要使用不同类别的指标来阐述生命周期清单的结果(Nigri et al.， 2014)。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Table 2 shows the inventory data of the dairy processing stage. Specifically, a large amount of water is needed during the cooling and pre-heating of raw milk, as well as the pre-heating and sterilization of the liquid milk. Electricity is mainly used for operating the equipment, and fuels are used to generate the steam required for the pre-heating and heating of the sterilizer (Riera et al., 2013). Cardboard paper is used to produce the outer packaging for the milk.
表2显示了乳制品加工阶段的库存数据。具体来说，原料奶的冷却和预热以及液态奶的预热和灭菌都需要大量的水。电力主要用于设备的运行，燃料用于产生灭菌器预热和加热所需的蒸汽(Riera et al.， 2013)。硬纸板被用来制作牛奶的外包装。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhao, R., Xu, Y., Wen, X., Zhang, N. & Cai, J. Carbon footprint assessment for a local branded pure milk product: a lifecycle based approach. Food Sci. Technol 38, 98–105 (2017).
Zhao, R., Xu, Y., Wen, X., Zhang, N. & Cai, J. Carbon footprint assessment for a local branded pure milk product: a lifecycle based approach. Food Sci. Technol 38, 98–105 (2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this LCA dataset, the focus should be on processes with a direct contribution to pure milk production, paying specific attention to energy and materials inputs as well as carbon emissions. Care should be taken in interpreting the simplified system boundary as it may not include all ancillary processes. For accurate life cycle impact assessments, users should consider the complete supply chain and end-of-life stages, which may require additional data beyond what is provided in this dataset. Inventory data in Table 2 should be used in conjunction with the specified methodology, and adjustments should be made when applying this data to different technological contexts or geographic locations.
在使用本LCA数据集时，应关注对纯牛奶生产有直接贡献的过程，特别注意能源和材料投入以及碳排放。在解读简化的系统边界时需要小心，因为它可能不包括所有辅助过程。为了准确的生命周期影响评估，用户应考虑完整的供应链和生命周期终端阶段，这可能需要额外的数据，超出本数据集提供的范围。表2中的库存数据应与指定的方法论结合使用，并且在将这些数据应用到不同的技术环境或地理位置时应进行调整。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
